item.title: Analyst: Bitcoin Key Support Level in $100,000 to $107,000 Range
item.description: On August 26th, CryptoQuant analyst Axel Adler Jr. made a post stating, "The recent strong support zone for Bitcoin is positioned within the range of $100,000 to $107,000. Here, the Short-Term Holder Realized Price (STH Realized Price) intersects with the 200-day Simple Moving Average (SMA 200D). Below this, the support level is approximately $92,000 to $93,000. This is a deeper support level that reflects the cost basis of short-term investors who have been holding for 3 to 6 months. If the market breaks down below the $100,000 to $107,000 range, this will serve as a crucial second line of defense."

item.title: Impacted by the listing of the KRW trading pair on Bithumb, SD surged over 36% in a short period.
item.description: On August 26th, according to HTX market data, due to the listing of a KRW trading pair on Bithumb, Stader (SD) experienced a rapid surge of over 36% in a short time and is now trading at $0.9168.

item.title: The Last Play (retire) is now live on the Bybit Web3 Wallet
item.description: August 26th. As per official channels, Bybit declared that The Last Play (retire) has officially kicked off on the Bybit Web3 wallet. Users are now capable of directly leveraging their Bybit Unified Trading Account (UTA) balance to promptly purchase the retire token, enabling them to relish a swift, secure, and Web3 onboarding experience.

item.title: Bithumb Adds Stether (SD) - Korean Won Trading Pair
item.description: On August 26th, Bithumb added a trading pair of Stether (SD) in KRW.

item.title: The Smarter Web Company Raises $5 Million to Increase Bitcoin Holdings
item.description: On August 26th, the publicly traded company The Smarter Web Company in the UK raised ￡3.7 million (equivalent to $5 million) in order to increase its holdings of Bitcoin.

item.title: Analyst: Federal Reserve's Future Direction Filled with Uncertainty
item.description: On August 26th, after U.S. President Trump dismissed Federal Reserve Board member Lisa Cook due to suspicion of mortgage application information fraud, the yield on U.S. Treasury bonds with a maturity of five years or more increased during Asian trading. Danske Bank analyst Asger Wilhelm Dalsjo stated in a report: "This unprecedented action may test the independence of the Fed. Cook's departure will enable Trump to further reshape the board of governors of the Fed, which may potentially influence future monetary policy." Cook has refuted these accusations. The market's reaction has been manifested in the change in U.S. Treasury bond yields, indicating potential policy changes and uncertainty about the Fed's future direction. (FXStreet)

item.title: Binance Wallet Launches Wallet Plugin Beta Version
item.description: On August 26th, according to official information, Binance Wallet has officially launched a Wallet Extension (in beta version). This enables users to now manage their crypto assets securely, interact with decentralized applications (dApps), and directly explore Web3 through the desktop Google Chrome browser.

item.title: Morgan Stanley: Expects the Fed to Cut Interest Rates by 25 Basis Points in March, June, September, and December 2026
item.description: August 26th - Morgan Stanley expressed that it anticipates the Federal Reserve to reduce interest rates by 25 basis points in March, June, September, and December of 2026, thereby bringing the target range to 2.75%-3.0%. (FXStreet)

item.title: 《From Meme Coin to Innovation-Driven: Decrypting the Doge Mining Eco-Transformation》 Theme Space is about to launch
item.description: August 26th. Starting from its unpretentious origin as a meme, Dogecoin has now risen to the top ten in terms of market capitalization. It has not only become a legend of transitioning from a joke to innovation but also a vivid manifestation of the PoW spirit of "minable by everyone and with rewards fairly distributed." BlockBeats is collaborating with mining machine manufacturers, mining pool representatives, and core members of the Dogecoin community to jointly host a Space talk with the theme of "From Meme Coin to Innovation-Driven: Decrypting the Doge Mining Ecosystem Transformation." This event will officially commence today at 22:00 (UTC+8).The event will feature several invited guests, such as Ben Weng, the Vice President of Product at ElphaPex, Payne Cong, the Head of Business Development at ElphaPex, Paphy Cai, the Chief Business Officer at ViaBTC, Denny Xing, the Vice President of Business Development at HashHouse, and Song, a core member of Doge Cardinals. item.title: J.P. Morgan: Expects the Fed to Cut Interest Rates by 25 Basis Points in September and December
item.description: On August 26th, Morgan Stanley anticipates that the Fed will reduce interest rates by 25 basis points in September and December respectively (previously it was predicted that there would be no rate cuts until 2025). (Financial Times)
